entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
